      • check

        boolean check(String id)
        Check if an AuthzGroup by this id exists.
        Parameters:
        id - The AuthzGroup id.
        Returns:
        true if an AuthzGroup by this id exists, false if not.

        Add a new AuthzGroup with this id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addNewUser

        void addNewUser(org.sakaiproject.authz.api.AuthzGroup azGroup,
              String userId,
              String roleId,
              int maxSize)
                throws org.sakaiproject.authz.api.GroupFullException
        Add a user to the AuthzGroup
        Parameters:
        azGroup - The AuthzGroup to which the user is being added
        userId - The user to add
        roleId - The user's role
        maxSize - The maximum size of the group.
        Throws:
        org.sakaiproject.authz.api.GroupFullException

      • removeUser

              String userId)
        Remove a user from the AuthzGroup
        Parameters:
        azGroup - The AuthzGroup to which the user is being added
        userId - The user to remove

        Remove this AuthzGroup.
        Parameters:
        azGroup - The azGroup to remove.

      • getAuthzGroups

        List getAuthzGroups(String criteria,
                  org.sakaiproject.javax.PagingPosition page)
        Access a list of AuthzGroups that meet specified criteria, naturally sorted.
        Parameters:
        criteria - Selection criteria: AuthzGroups returned will match this string somewhere in their id, or provider group id.
        page - The PagePosition subset of items to return.
        Returns:
        The List (AuthzGroup) of AuthzGroups that meet specified criteria.

      • getAuthzUserGroupIds

        List getAuthzUserGroupIds(ArrayList authzGroupIds,
                        String user_id)
        Access a list of AuthzGroups that meet specified criteria for a specified user_id
        Parameters:
        authzGroupIds - AuthzGroup selection criteria (list of authz group ids)
        user_id - Return only groups with user_id as a member
        Returns:
        The List (AuthzGroup) that meet specified criteria.

      • getAuthzUsersInGroups

        Collection<String> getAuthzUsersInGroups(Set<String> groupIds)
        Return a list of users in the specified group list
        Parameters:
        groupIds - set of authz group ids
        Returns:
        collection of user ids

      • countAuthzGroups

        int countAuthzGroups(String criteria)
        Count the AuthzGroup objets that meet specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - Selection criteria: realms returned will match this string somewhere in their id, or provider group id.
        Returns:
        The count of AuthzGroups that meet specified criteria.

        Set getProviderIds(String authzGroupId)
        Get the provider IDs for an AuthzGroup
        Parameters:
        authzGroupId - The ID of the AuthzGroup
        Returns:
        The Set (String) of provider IDs

        Get the AuthzGroup IDs associated with a provider ID.
        Parameters:
        providerId - The provider id
        Returns:

        Complete the read process once the basic AuthzGroup info has been read.

      • isAllowed

        boolean isAllowed(String userId,
                String function,
                String azGroupId)
        Test if this user is allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroup.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The function to open.
        azGroupId - The AuthzGroup id to consult, if it exists.
        Returns:
        true if this user is allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroup, false if not.

      • isAllowed

        boolean isAllowed(String userId,
                String function,
                Collection<String> realms)
        Test if this user is allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The function to open.
        azGroups - A collection of AuthzGroup ids to consult.
        Returns:
        true if this user is allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups, false if not.

      • getUsersIsAllowed

        Set getUsersIsAllowed(String function,
                    Collection azGroups)
        Get the set of user ids of users who are allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups.
        Parameters:
        function - The function to check.
        azGroups - A collection of the ids of AuthzGroups to consult.
        Returns:
        the Set (String) of user ids of users who are allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups.

      • getUsersIsAllowedByGroup

        Set<String[]> getUsersIsAllowedByGroup(String function,
                                     Collection<String> azGroups)
        Get the set of user ids per group of users who are allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups.
        Parameters:
        function - The function to check.
        azGroups - A collection of the ids of AuthzGroups to consult.
        Returns:
        A Set of String arrays (userid, realm) with user ids per group who are allowed to perform the function in the named AuthzGroups.

      • getUserCountIsAllowed

        Map<String,Integer> getUserCountIsAllowed(String function,
                                        Collection<String> azGroups)
        Get the number of users per group who are allowed to perform the function in the given AuthzGroups.
        Parameters:
        function - The function to check.
        azGroups - A collection of the ids of AuthzGroups to consult.
        Returns:
        A Map (authzgroupid (String) -> user count (Integer) ) of the number of users who are allowed to perform the function in the given AuthzGroups.

      • getAllowedFunctions

        Set getAllowedFunctions(String role,
                      Collection azGroups)
        Get the set of functions that users with this role in these AuthzGroups are allowed to perform.
        Parameters:
        role - The role name.
        azGroups - A collection of AuthzGroup ids to consult.
        Returns:
        the Set (String) of functions that users with this role in these AuthzGroups are allowed to perform

      • getAuthzGroupsIsAllowed

        Set getAuthzGroupsIsAllowed(String userId,
                          String function,
                          Collection azGroups)
        Get the set of AuthzGroup ids in which this user is allowed to perform this function.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The function to check.
        azGroups - The Collection of AuthzGroup ids to search; if null, search them all.
        Returns:
        the Set (String) of AuthzGroup ids in which this user is allowed to perform this function.

      • getUserRole

        String getUserRole(String userId,
                 String azGroupId)
        Get the role name for this user in this AuthzGroup.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The function to open.
        azGroupId - The AuthzGroup id to consult, if it exists.
        Returns:
        the role name for this user in this AuthzGroup, if the user has active membership, or null if not.

      • getUserRoles

        Map<String,String> getUserRoles(String userId,
                              Collection<String> azGroupIds)
        Get all role names for a given user in a set of AuthzGroups.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID of the person to search for.
        azGroupIds - A collection of AuthzGroup IDs to narrow the search (may be empty or null to search all).
        Returns:
        A Map (AuthzGroup ID -> role name) for every AuthzGroup where the user is a member, filtered to the set of AuthzGroups in azGroupIds (if non-null and non-empty).

      • getUsersRole

        Map getUsersRole(Collection userIds,
               String azGroupId)
        Get the role name for each user in the userIds Collection in this AuthzGroup.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The function to open.
        azGroupId - The AuthzGroup id to consult, if it exists.
        Returns:
        A Map (userId -> role name) of role names for each user who have active membership; if the user does not, it will not be in the Map.

      • refreshUser

        void refreshUser(String userId,
               Map providerMembership)
        Refresh this user's roles in any AuthzGroup that has an entry in the map; the user's new role is in the map.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id
        providerMembership - The Map of external group id -> role id.

      • refreshAuthzGroup

        void refreshAuthzGroup(BaseAuthzGroup azGroup)
        Refresh the external user - role membership for this AuthzGroup
        Parameters:
        azGroup - The azGroup to refresh.
